title: Shared decision-making is cornerstone of multiple sclerosis treatment

title_detail.value: Shared decision-making is cornerstone of multiple sclerosis treatment

summary: One of the cornerstones of multiple sclerosis treatment is shared decision-making between patients and their doctors and nurses, according to a new report.

summary_detail.value: One of the cornerstones of multiple sclerosis treatment is shared decision-making between patients and their doctors and nurses, according to a new report.
